content.eamr: ( ing-0 "6 tablespoons butter or margarine, divided" )

content.text: 1 1/2 pounds halibut steaks, bones removed and cut into 1 inch cubes
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 1/2 pounds halibut steaks, bones removed and cut into 1 inch cubes" )
( ing-2 "2 garlic cloves, minced" )
( ing-3 "3/4 teaspoon dried thyme" )
( ing-4 "1/3 cup all-purpose flour" )
( ing-5 "1/2 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-6 "1 1/2 cups chicken broth" )
( ing-7 "1 cup heavy whipping cream" )

content.text: 8 ounces lasagna noodles, cooked and drained
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "8 ounces lasagna noodles, cooked and drained" )
( ing-9 "2 cups shredded Swiss cheese" )
( ing-10 "Minced fresh parsley" )

content.text: 0) In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "melt"@40:44 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "2 tablespoons butter"@45:65 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large skillet"@6:21 / TOOL )
		:heat ( "medium heat"@27:38 / OTHER )
	)
)

( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "halibut"@7:14 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "garlic"@16:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "thyme"@27:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Cook until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 10 minutes.
4) Add the remaining butter to the skillet.
5) Stir in flour and salt until smooth; cook and stir until golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Stir"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "flour"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "salt"@21:25 / FOOD )
		:duration ( cond-5-0 "until smooth"@26:38 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "cook"@40:44 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( cond-5-1 "until golden brown"@54:72 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-2 "stir"@49:53 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "add"@13:16 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "broth"@17:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "cream"@27:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
8) In a greased 13-in baking dish, layer half of the noodles, halibut, white sauce and cheese.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "layer"@35:40 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "half of the noodles"@41:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "halibut"@62:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "white sauce"@71:82 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "cheese"@87:93 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "a greased 13-in baking dish"@6:33 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes.
11) Uncover; bake 20 minutes longer or until bubbly.
